name: [AR] Pocket Golf
description:
Playing Golf requires a lot of space and asks you for expensive memberships. With «[AR] Pocket Golf» this is now over. Just play golf whenever and wherever you want.

With «[AR] Pocket Golf», you get the first augmented reality golfing app, that really gives you the feeling of playing golf, combined with a completely new gaming experience. Play golf with proper 3D movements. Use your device like a virtual golf club. Choose between a driver or putter. Hole in and tee off.

Use the settings menu. Here you find useful configuration options such as the sensitivity of the club, momentum of inertia or the direction of light. In addition, you can increase the size of the golf ball, which is unexpectedly funny, so we left this in the app.

In addition the app offers a special left handed mode, to mirror the major elements and the affected gaming area. Last but not least, there is a an alternative contrast color, intended to be used if you play with the app on a certain lawn. All graphic 3D elements are of the highest quality.

As always, this game will be without in-app purchases or annoying ads to help you get a nice product.

We wish you a lot of fun with this AR title.
